data.comment: The match is underway at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Piero Giacomelli awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Throw-in for Bologna at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 4, Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli awards Bologna a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 10, Roberto Soriano (Bologna) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Spezia close to the penalty box.
Piero Giacomelli signals a throw-in for Spezia, close to Bologna's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Spezia are caught offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in La Spezia.
Emanuel Vignato gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bologna.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Free kick Bologna.
Riccardo Marchizza (Spezia) has received a yellow card from Piero Giacomelli.
In the minute 17, Spezia have a goal kick.
Piero Giacomelli signals a Bologna throw-in in Spezia's half.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
In the minute 19, M'bala Nzola scores to make it 1-0 at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Emmanuel Gyasi with an assist there.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Spezia have a dangerous throw-in.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 23, Musa Barrow for Bologna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in La Spezia.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Takehiro Tomiyasu (Bologna) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in La Spezia.
In the minute 26, Spezia needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Spezia.
Bologna push upfield but Piero Giacomelli quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Spezia in the half of Bologna.
Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Spezia.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Bologna.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 31, Free kick Bologna.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Spezia.
In the minute 34, Takehiro Tomiyasu's header is off-target for Bologna.
Piero Giacomelli awards Spezia a goal kick.
Spezia advance rapidly upfield but Piero Giacomelli blows for offside.
In the minute 36, Nahuel Estevez of Spezia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Bologna have a goal kick.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Emmanuel Gyasi is booked for the home team.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 39, Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 42, Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spezia's half?
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Piero Giacomelli signals a throw-in for Bologna, close to Spezia's area.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 45, Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Spezia.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Bologna goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Piero Giacomelli signals a Spezia throw-in in Bologna's half.
The first half has been concluded at Stadio Alberto Picco.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Kevin Agudelo hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in La Spezia for Spezia.
In La Spezia, Spezia push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Bologna.
Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Bologna.
In the minute 49, Lucien Agoume (Spezia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Spezia have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in La Spezia.
Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spezia's half?
In the minute 53, Spezia will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bologna.
In La Spezia Bologna drive forward through Musa Barrow. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Bologna push forward at Stadio Alberto Picco and Rodrigo Palacio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spezia defence.
In the minute 55, Spezia's M'bala Nzola misses with an attempt on goal.
Spezia's Giulio Maggiore breaks free at Stadio Alberto Picco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Piero Giacomelli awards Bologna a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Bologna make their first substitution with Mattias Svanberg replacing Emanuel Vignato.
Piero Giacomelli awards the away team a throw-in.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Spezia to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Throw-in for Bologna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the home team in La Spezia.
Bologna are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Goal! M'bala Nzola extends Spezia's lead to 2-0.
The home team have replaced Kevin Agudelo with Diego Farias. This is the first substitution made today by Vincenzo Italiano.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Spezia.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Spezia.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 72, Nicolas Dominguez keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
Musa Barrow instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 73, Spezia are whistled for offside.
Vincenzo Italiano is making the team's second substitution at Stadio Alberto Picco with Alessandro Deiola replacing Giulio Maggiore.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Spezia.
In the minute 75, Spezia have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Bologna needs to be cautious. Spezia have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
Free kick Spezia.
Sinisa Mihajlovic (Bologna) is making a second substitution, with Andrea Poli replacing Nicolas Dominguez.
In the minute 81, Andri Fannar Baldursson is replacing Gary Medel for Bologna at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Matteo Ricci is replacing Lucien Agoume for Spezia at Stadio Alberto Picco.
Vincenzo Italiano is making the team's fourth substitution at Stadio Alberto Picco with Tommaso Pobega replacing Nahuel Estevez.
In the minute 82, Bologna drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Simone Rabbi is replacing Rodrigo Palacio for the away team.
Piero Giacomelli blows against Bologna's Simone Rabbi for offside.
Can Spezia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
In the minute 85, Free kick in a good position for Bologna!
Julian Chabot (Spezia) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in La Spezia.
In the minute 86, Bologna have a goal kick.
In La Spezia Spezia attack through Emmanuel Gyasi. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Bologna at Stadio Alberto Picco.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Spezia.
Piero Giacomelli signals a Spezia throw-in in Bologna's half.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Piero Giacomelli signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
In La Spezia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Piero Giacomelli.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
An attacking Bologna player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Bologna are awarded a penalty ... Musa Barrow botches the spot kick!
The match is over. Final score 2-2.
Ivan Provedel is booked for the home team.
Goal! The away team draw level at 2-2 through Musa Barrow.
Martin Erlic (Spezia) has received a first yellow card.
